title: (PSP-PSX) Resident Evil 2 DUAL SHOCK EDITION (NO RPD FREEZE) GOR
description:
Game: Resident Evil 2: Dual Shock Edition
Region: NTSC-U
Year: 1998
Producer: CAPCOM

Description:
First there was the disaster at the mansion lab. Umbrella Corp. developed the T-virus, a muta-genic toxin for use in biological weapons. After breaking loose living things mutated into all sorts of decaying creatures. The case was eventually closed, but Umbrella's experiments were far from over. CAN YOU SURVIVE THE HORROR? Now it's the worst possible nightmare: a new virus runs rampant. Blood-thirsty zombies, hideous mutations, now overwhelm the community. When Leon and Claire arrive in town their nightmare is just beginning... You now control their destiny.

Note: Only works with 3.52 pops via popsloader. Otherwise you will still get the freeze or worse.

Infinite Ammunition Code: During the game go to the controller configuration menu. Hold the right trigger and his square 10 times. Manual or Auto will turn red (Depending on what you have it set to.).
Infinite Gatling Gun and Rocket Launcher in chest: Start the game in arrange mode and repeat the steps above.
Enjoy the game!

GORESlinger
HELP KEEP THE HOMEBREW SCENE ALIVE!!! SEED!!!
Thank you for all of the comments and positive feedback!
